front.title: Dissemination of Flow Specification Rules for MPLS Flow

abstract.t: Dissemination of Flow Specification Rules [RFC5575] specifies BGP SAFI 133/134 and NLRI types/extended communities to propagate the native IP flow information for the purpose of dropping, rate limiting or filtering. This proposal extends the current [RFC5575], adds more specifications to propagate MPLS flow information.
